New Records: Emmanuel Clase tied Cody Allen with 149 career saves on Cleveland’s all-time list
Key Match Events: Bo Naylor sparked a rally in the seventh inning with his 11th home run
Cleveland took the lead with three more runs thanks to a variety of bloop hits and slap singles
Emmanuel Clase mowed through the top of the Royals lineup for his 39th save
Pre-Game Insights: Cleveland (76-58) moved one game ahead of Kansas City (75-59) for sole possession of first place in the division with 28 games remaining
The two clubs meet again on Monday for a three-game set at Kauffman Stadium
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Stephen Vogt highlighted the team's resilience and response after losing nine of their previous 11 games
Vinnie Pasquantino collected a career-high four hits and took Cleveland starter Tanner Bibee deep in the first inning
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cleveland’s six hits in the seventh marked a season high for a single inning
Brennan has hit in 12 of 18 games since being recalled from Triple-A Columbus on Aug. 8
